People with visual impairments who view the Olympic Games cannot see what's happening on the field, in the pool, or on the balance beam, but they're getting help in visualizing it. NBCUniversal has partnered with a Canadian company, Descriptive Video Works that have announcers who specialize in describing the games to a visually impaired audience.
